description: This file defines a Python class 'ElevenLabsTools' that provides methods to interact with the ElevenLabs API for text-to-speech and sound effect generation, including handling audio processing and integration with agent and team objects.

classes.name: ElevenLabsTools
classes.description: A toolkit class for interacting with ElevenLabs API to generate and process audio, including text-to-speech and sound effects, with support for saving files and attaching audio artifacts to agents or teams.

methods.name: get_voices
methods.description: Fetches all available voices from the ElevenLabs API and returns a string representation of the list.

methods.name: _process_audio
methods.description: Processes an audio generator into a base64 string, optionally saving the audio to disk if a target directory is specified.

methods.name: generate_sound_effect
methods.description: Generates a sound effect from a text prompt, attaches the resulting audio to an agent or team, and returns a success or error message.

methods.name: text_to_speech
methods.description: Converts text to speech audio, attaches the audio to an agent or team, and returns a success or error message.
